Text: Gas Cashxls Cc Please note that I will be sending the cash flow forecast instead of Phil Polsky in the future
keystone Cc Kevin Attached you will find several diagrams outlining proposed structures for Keystone Please let me know when you would have time to talk to us regarding the proposed structures Paul

Info request for SoCal and PGEpst Joe You mentioned last night that you had had no luck on getting curves for Feb th If you dont think that anything is going to change in that respect could you give me what you have I can then go talk to PWC and let them know that we have done all that we feasibly can Thanks Paul

FW Info for Broker Quotespst Original Message From Hernandez Alex Sent Monday March PM To Gregory Paul Cc Subject FW Info for Broker Quotes Paul Could you please get broker quotes for the volumes locations in the spreadsheet below We need the quotes for the purposes of validating our internal curves and making EY more comfortable with our OXY valuation Thank You Alex Original Message From mailto Sent Monday March PM To Hernandez Alex Subject Info for Broker Quotes See attached file OXY MTM Curves Wholesalexls The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Info request for SoCal and PGEJoe You mentioned last night that you had had no luck on getting curves for Feb th If you dont think that anything is going to change in that respect could you give me what you have I can then go talk to PWC and let them know that we have done all that we feasibly can Thanks Paul

tomorrows gamePlease let me know by this afternoon whether you can play tomorrow night Time Place Alief not Cullen Opponent Avangard If the weather looks bad be sure to call after pm tomorrow for a status of the games

referee questionA proposal has been brought forward regarding next season Do we want to have refs at the game ie a referee and linesmen The cost would increase from a game to ish a game Some teams have suggested that this is not necessary as this is in fact a recreational league I tend to agree Let me know your thoughts and I will pass them on to the league

last gameWe are scheduled to play our last game tomorrow night The st vs nd rd vs th etc teams play each other We are playing the th place team If we win we could finish in th if we lose we would finish in th Let me know by this afternoon if you can play tomorrow Time pm Place Cullen Park Field A Opponent Entrix we beat them during the regular season Please be at the field a little early so that we can organize Please bring your jerseys to the game Call tomorrow after pm to make sure the game is still on weatherrelated
responses guys have said they can play Jason Paul Matt Gabriel Barry Marc Justin Michael Nos Richard Felipe
RAINOUTTodays game has been rained out The game will be played next week same time same place Time pm Place Cullen Park Field A Call Tuesday afternoon after pm to check on rainout info
responses guys have said they can play Jason Paul Matt Gabriel Barry Marc Justin Michael Nos Richard Felipe

Upcoming SeasonThe season will not start next week since several teams have not sent in complete registration forms The earliest the season could begin is September th In the meantime the Enron Blue team wants to scrimmage in preparation for the season They have guys who have already committed to playing this Saturday Please let me know if you can play this Saturday am I will try to reserve the field behind South Main Baptist Church Main near Richmond For those of you who havent paid yet please do so ASAP Lastly we currently have guys registered with spaces left If you know of anyone who could play on a consistent basis please let me know

soccer seasonIt appears that our first game of the season will be tomorrow night at pm With all of the heavy rain we have had there is a good chance that the game will be postponed To verify please call after pm tomorrow Please let me know if you will be able to play and can driveneed a ride Time pm Please show up by pm Place Cullen Park Field B Opponent Nitos Painting Note You must wear shinguards in order to play Dont forget water Directions to Cullen Park Go west on I Pass Beltway and Highway Exit at Barker Cypress Turn right north on Barker Cypress Turn left west at Saums there will be a stop light at Saums Go past the softballbaseball fields and turn left The soccer fields will be lighted

saturdayWe have the field behind South Main Baptist church from am We have invited the Blue team to scrimmage again Please let me know if you can attend Hopefully we can have as good a turnout as last week Attached is the season schedule PS For those who have not yet paid registration fees please do so ASAP
